column5: Headed up to Bluffy for fall fishing with the family. Excellent fishing this spring. Anyone fish up there is Summer? How was it?

Returned from a week at Bluffy Lake and killed it! Lots of quality eaters and plenty in the 20+ range. Finding fish in the 7-15 ft range trolling minnow rigs. Others were finding them deep 22-25 ft. Plenty to keep the daughters interested all day!
